#summary Installation HSTemplate in your project

= Download =

You can download HSTemplate from Code-Google:
  * use SVN: `svn checkout http://hstemplate.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ hstemplate`
  * use web-browser: `http://code.google.com/p/hstemplate/downloads/list`

= Installation =

If you download archiv with source unpack it to temporary directory

  * copy directory `HSTemplate` to your project
  * include file `HSTemplate.class.php`
  * all ready :)
